content.question: What are all values of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, for <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="2 sin squared theta equals negative sin theta"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="pi"><semantics><mi>π</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="pi over 6"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="pi"><semantics><mi>π</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​​<math alttext="pi over 2"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="pi over 3"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​​​<math alttext="pi over 2"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​​<math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="pi"><semantics><mi>π</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="fraction numerator 11 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
